job.title: Quality Assurance Analyst
job.description: <p>Need to participate in the following activities:</p><p> 1. Requirement Gathering and Analysis: Analyse functional/non-functional requirements and seek clarifications for better understanding of requirements Define timeline estimates based on the requirements</p><p> 2. Design: Preparation of technical specification document and review the same</p><p> 3. Coding: Follow coding standards and best practices to check code quality Conduct technical troubleshooting</p><p> 4. Testing: Perform Unit testing and coordinate with QA team during the testing phase</p><p>5. Knowledge Management: Create specific artifacts for tasks allocated by supervisor Apply best practices/ learning during development activities."</p><p>6.<strong>Spanish&nbsp;fluency is the requirement with the ability to follow phone flows alongside an English-speaking QA tester.</strong></p>
